SEARCH
Package view

Class ViewImpl

java.lang.Object
view.ViewImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class ViewImpl extends Object implements View
The controller implementation that receives all its inputs from an InputStream object and transmits all outputs to a PrintStream object. It also interacts with the model based on the received input from the user.

  • Constructor Summary

    Construct a view implementation object that has the provided PrintStream object.
